title: Manchester United predicted line-up vs Charlton as Jack Butland and Lisandro Martinez start
description: Man United lock horns with Charlton Athletic in the quarter-finals of the Carabao Cup at Old Trafford on Tuesday night.

title: BCCI unlikely to consider Rohit, Kohli for T20s
description: It is understood that the duo have made themselves available but it is learnt that they will be persuaded to rethink their T20 future.

title: Five talking points from Atletico 0-1 Barcelona
description: A huge win for the Catalans. Barcelonas win over Atletico has moved Xavis side three points clear at the top of the table.
